comments.body: Curiously, I'd commented that this test fails on Windows also due to https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/18441, however this is now passing. Not sure if my issue is incorrect and it's Mac-only, or if that issue may be fixed too (on Windows, at least)?
Yeah, something is up with the mac, not sure what. But #18441 seems to be no longer a problem - uris should work.

https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/18441 still seems an issue on my Mac (unskipping this test fails waiting for an isolate pause event). I'm not sure if it's just started passing on Windows, or my report for this issue was just bad. I'll add a note to that issue that it may be macOS only anyway.
